column1: Little Goat Diner////Great ambience and fantastic servicr
column2: perfect for a late Saturday brunch! The booths were comfy and there was plenty of sunlight. Servers were very friendly
column6: but not necessarily the best food I've had in Chicago. Honestly
column7: the food I had was slightly bland and needed a little more added to it. Drinks were also decent
column9: but the coffee was quite satisfying. I would recommend this as a safe option for a brunch or warm meal in this area!
